snippet.title: Vic man charged following church search
snippet.content: A man has been charged with child pornography offences following raids at a Melbourne church and home. The 52-year-old was arrested on Thursday during searches of a church at suburban Sunshine and at a nearby residence following a 12-month police investigation. The man was bailed to appear in Melbourne Magistrates Courts on Friday, charged with transmitting child pornography and related offences. Originally published as
